nodes.text: Galaxy Publishing was a publishing company, responsible for infotainment brochures, holopromotions, and other media. They were a contributing sponsor of the Corporate Sector Authority. Galaxy Publishing had produced promotional material for Galaxy Tours and Arakyd Industries, and even served as the public relations firm handling the business interests of various Hutts. The board of directors ended their affiliation once they realized that they could do little to improve the image of the Hutts.
